channel.title: Website hosting?
channel.description:
Hey im just looking for someone to help me out with a few questions.
Firstly is it possible to host my server off a site like bravenet.com (paid for) and how do i do it? if i do this does it mean i need a webclient?
Ill post more if i need a hand TY

item.title: Website hosting?
item.dc:creator: @thoompie thoompie
item.description:
@thoompie wrote:

You can host the webclient on your webhost, but to host a server, you can either choose to host it on your own IP,
Or as cultivated mentioned before, rent a rack! VPS or dedicated, of which the prices vary from 15 -250 eur

Read full topic

item.title: Website hosting?
item.dc:creator: @Cultivated Cultivated
item.description:
@Cultivated wrote:

That means you can only host it on your computer unless you get a VPS or Dedicated server.

Read full topic

item.title: Website hosting?
item.dc:creator: @Swiftymcfeat Swiftymcfeat
item.description:
@Swiftymcfeat wrote:

Does that mean there will be NO hosting off my comp?

Read full topic

item.title: Website hosting?
item.dc:creator: @Cultivated Cultivated
item.description:
@Cultivated wrote:

No there is not. You can’t host off a website. You can host off of VPS’s and Dedicated Servers (Which aren’t free, and good ones aren’t cheap.)

Read full topic
